item.title: IT Security
item.author: naamkyda
item.description: A collection of CTF write-ups, vulnerability analyses, reverse engineering projects, and articles on both offensive and defensive information security.

item.title: Mind
item.author: naamkyda
item.description: The silence gives birth to chaos, to eternal beauty. The crowds sing and fade away. Everything else is moving in circles. The myriad things is born.

item.title: Tech Archive
item.author: naamkyda
item.description: Documentation of debugging journeys through broken systems, strange bugs and behaviors, reviews of cool tools and technologies, and more.
